channel.title: this WEEK in TECH Video (HD)
channel.description: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital technology. Winner of the 2005 People's Choice Podcast Award for best overall podcast and Best Technology Podcast. Released every Sunday at midnight Pacific.
channel.generator: Feeder 2.2.4(1524); Mac OS X Version 10.6.8 (Build 10K549) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/

item.title: TWiT 409: Her Skin Bowls
item.description:
Hosts: Leo Laporte, John C. Dvorak, Mike Elgan, Nilay Patel, and Joanna Stern.

How much security?, smart spy phones, patent troll wars, Snapchat mofos, and more.

Download or subscribe to this show at twit.tv/twit.
